name: Lawrence Culley - The Void (Challenge 4)
description:
Description

The Void is a game about screaming into the void! The louder you scream into your mic, the more Void Essence you gain to feed to your monster, known as The Void! Use The Void to become the most powerful Void Monster Trainer that ever lived.

Note: although mic connectivity was intended, a simulation of what would happen if you scream into the mic was made instead due to time constraints.

Key Features

Scream into your mic to gain experience

Use experience to train a powerful void monster

Use The Void to battle other powerful monsters fit to rival your own

The Controls

UI elements are activated by pressing left click, they work as follows:

Quit – Exits game

Outside of battle:

Increase/Decrease – Increase/Decrease simulated volume

Scream Into Void – Gives Void Essence based on simulated volume

Train Monster – Gives Void Essence to The Void to make it grow

Battle Enemy – Click to battle an enemy of the shown level

During Battle:

Big Attack – Deals between 1 damage and 2 * Monsters Level in damage

Accurate Attack – Deals Monsters Level in damage
